DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate immediate short-term effect combination lateral customized foot orthoses pain medial knee load gait among medial knee osteoarthritis patient . The effect combination compare single use device . The investigator recruit 22 knee osteoarthritis . They wear treatment ( foot orthoses , knee brace combination ) three month . A fifteen day wash-out period give three month . Biomechanical evaluation carry three month . This evaluation consist three questionnaire ( Knee Osteoarthritis Outcome Score ( KOOS ) , Western Ontario McMaster Universities Osteoarthritis Index ( WOMAC ) Medical Outcome Study Short Form-36 ( MOS-SF36 ) ) , motion analysis optoelectronic system , 6-min walk test . During motion analysis , ten gait trial execute without treatment ten treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Combination Lateral Foot Orthoses Knee Brace Treatment Knee Osteoarthritis
